publicationStmt.publisher: The Characters that shaped the Silk Road - A Database and Digital Paleography of Tarim

history.provenance: found in Qizil Miŋ-ÖyRothkuppelraumduring T III MQR 74 (on the frame)/ T III MQ 49 (on the fragment)

language.ana: frg:ls-cetom-classical frg:ls-cetom-aberrant-archaic frg:ls-peyrot-A3 frg:ls-C14 frg:ls-tamai-C1 frg:ls-C14

seg.seg: Mit der Gesetzestrommel hast du die [Wesen] der fünf Geburtsklassen zur Nirvāṇastadt gerufen.
With the drum of the law you have summoned the [beings] of the five incarnations to the city of Nirvāṇa.
Und auch wie der Mond unter den Planeten hast du dich, von Mönchen umgeben, ausgenommen.
And also like the moon among the planets you appeared, [when] surrounded by monks.
